1. Everyone taking part rolls. Then compare the lowest SL of the pursued and the highest SL of the pursuers.
2. If the persued win add to distance or if the perusers win subtract from distance.
3. If the Distance falls to 0 or less, the pursuers have caught their quarry! Or if the Distance reaches 10+, the pursuers have lost their quarry! But if the Distance is still between 1-9, Roll again!
